title: Smart Data Models - GovGAST
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Single shaft gas turbine.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovGAST

at.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ambient temperature load limit (Load Limit).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

dturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0.0

kt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature limiter gain (Kt).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0). Default: 0.0

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop (R).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor mechanism time constant (T1).  T1 represents the natural valve positioning time constant of the governor for small disturbances, as seen when rate limiting is not in effect.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine power time constant (T2).  T2 represents delay due to internal energy storage of the gas turbine engine. T2 can be used to give a rough approximation to the delay associated with acceleration of the compressor spool of a multi-shaft engine, or with the compressibility of gas in the plenum of a the free power turbine of an aero-derivative unit, for example.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine exhaust temperature time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

vmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
